## Getting Help

Thank you for using BlackRoad OS! Here's how to get support:

### ðŸ“š Documentation
- Visit [blackroad.io/docs](https://blackroad.io) for comprehensive documentation

### ðŸ’¬ Community
- **GitHub Discussions**: Ask questions and share ideas
- **Issues**: Report bugs or request features

### ðŸ“§ Direct Support
- **Email**: blackroad.systems@gmail.com
- **Response Time**: Within 24-48 hours

### ðŸ”’ Security Issues
- **DO NOT** report security vulnerabilities publicly
- Email: blackroad.systems@gmail.com with subject "[SECURITY]"
- See [SECURITY.md](.github/SECURITY.md) for details
